google_google_folder.description: Allows management of a Google Cloud Platform folder.

parent.description: The resource name of the parent Folder or Organization.

name.description: The resource name of the Folder. Its format is folders/{folder_id}.

lifecycle_state.description: The lifecycle state of the folder such as `ACTIVE` or `DELETE_REQUESTED`.

create_time.description: Timestamp when the Folder was created. Assigned by the server.
